thread.title: Remember the Alamodome? The Final Four Might Not Be Back

author: Rachel Bachman
title: Remember the Alamodome? The Final Four Might Not Be Back
text:
San Antonio
Thousands of college basketball fans have strolled San Antonio’s River Walk during this men’s Final Four, weaving past margarita bars and basking in sun-bathed 80-degree days.
Villanova coach Jay Wright called San Antonio one of the best Final Four settings for its weather, scenery and “the fact you can walk everywhere.” Kansas... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
